content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ExternalTable]
(
	 [id] INT,
	 Name VARCHAR(20),
	 Age int,
	 Gender varchar(6)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'helo.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [External_Data_Source_DedicatedSql],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ExternalFileFormat_DedicatedSql]
)

SELECT TOP (100) [id]
,[Name]
,[Age]
,[Gender]
 FROM [dbo].[ExternalTable]
